xwikidoc.name: XGalleryTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields XGalleryCode.XGalleryClass_autoSliding=Auto-Sliding XGalleryCode.XGalleryClass_interval=Interval XGalleryCode.XGalleryClass_carouselWidth=Width XGalleryCode.XGalleryClass_carouselHeight=Height XGalleryCode.XGalleryClass_backgroundColor=Background Color xgallery.slide_title=Caption title xgallery.slide_titleSize=Title size xgallery.slide_titleColor=Title color xgallery.slide_text=Caption text xgallery.slide_textSize=Text size xgallery.slide_textColor=Text Color xgallery.slide_link=Caption title link xgallery.slide_delete=Delete Slide xgallery.slide_addSlide=Add new slide
# Class helper text xgallery.helper_autoSliding=Will slide automatically at given interval. xgallery.helper_interval=Time between automatic slides (if AUTO-SLIDING is on), in milliseconds (default is 5000). xgallery.helper_width=Width in pixels (ex: 1000), if left blank it will take the full width of it's container. xgallery.helper_height=Height in pixels (ex: 200), if left blank it will take the height of the image. xgallery.helper_bgcolor=Click the input for color-picker. You can also add the color yourself if you know the CSS id for it.
# Live table generic keys xgallery.livetable.doc.title=Page title xgallery.livetable.doc.name=Page name xgallery.livetable.doc.space=Space xgallery.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name xgallery.livetable.doc.author=Last Author xgallery.livetable.doc.creator=Creator xgallery.livetable.doc.date=Update date xgallery.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date xgallery.livetable._avatar=Avatar xgallery.livetable._images=Images xgallery.livetable._attachments=Attachments xgallery.livetable._actions=Actions xgallery.livetable._actions.edit=Edit xgallery.livetable._actions.delete=Delete xgallery.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys xgallery.livetable.autoSliding=Auto-Sliding xgallery.livetable.interval=Interval xgallery.livetable.carouselWidth=Width xgallery.livetable.carouselHeight=Height xgallery.livetable.backgroundColor=Background Color
# Miscellaneous keys xgallery.image.imagealt=No image was set for this slide
